shocked and upset by an unpleasant experience: He was badly shaken after the attack. She wasn't hurt but was very shaken up.
More examplesFewer examplesWayne scrambled to the road, cut, bruised and badly shaken. Officers spoke to a woman seated in her car, too shaken by the incident to drive.His daughter was shaken up but managed to memorize the pickup's license plate.
